answers.answer: Yup. I am wondering if im hypoglycemic again. I grew out of it, but it can randomly pop up out of nowhere. My last doctor's appointment I almost passed out like five times
I get that way .my doctor told me its a common pregancy thing.
Besides possibly having hypoglycemia (low blood sugar) that may also be a sign of preeclampsia or high blood pressure. You should talk to your doctor about it ASAP.
My blood pressure has always been normal but I will bring it up on the 10
^^ Mine has been too & the dizzines doesn't always happen.

question: Do any of you ladies get dizzy while sitting down ? Like out of the nowhere .
title: Dizzines
